sentences.en: Bristling fur makes them appear larger and more formidable to their adversaries.
sentences.cn: 将毛竖起来能让它们在敌人面前显得身子比较庞大且更具威吓力.

sentences.en: From North Point and South walls bristling, quaint spectacular.
sentences.cn: 由北望南,高墙林立, 古朴壮观.

sentences.en: I snapped a small limb bristling with hot pink azaleas off the bush.
sentences.cn: 我在花丛中折断了一小枝桃红色杜鹃花.

sentences.en: Marcus stepped towards her, bristling with a mixture of fear and anger.
sentences.cn: 马库斯向她靠过来, 混合着一股畏惧与恼怒.

sentences.en: Nelson , his whiskers bristling with anticipation, leads his trainer across a field.
sentences.cn: 因期待而竖起胡须的尼尔森带著训练师穿过一块田野.

sentences.en: There were hardly any black coats or round hats now, but smock frocks, blouses, caps, and bristling and cadaverous heads.
sentences.cn: 里面几乎没有穿黑衣服戴圆边帽的人。是些穿罩衫、布褂、戴鸭舌帽、头发蓬乱竖立、面如土色的人。

sentences.en: We were given charge of three Ships of the Line - heavy duty war vessels, bristling with cannons.
sentences.cn: 我们被给与三艘船控制 - 重型船舰, 大炮林立.

words.tran_cn: 毛发竖立；发怒；被布满（bristle的ing形式）
